summary: My first mod. Inspired by the Lord of the Rings trilogy swords. Features only one weapon.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod ever, so constructive criticism will be very much appreciated. I made this sword because I\'m a big fan of Lord of the Rings. I just started reading the books and watching the movies a while back (I know, its a bit late lol). 

The sword can be upgraded and enchanted.

---------------------------------------
Installation/Uninstallation
---------------------------------------

Extract the \"Calandu.rar\" and place its contents into the \"Data\" folder.
or
Use Nexus Mod Manager (Recommended)

To uninstall, delete the files :
- Calandu.esp
- \"Calandu\" folder in meshes/weapons
- \"Calandu\" folder in texture/weapons


---------------------------------------
Location
---------------------------------------

You can find this weapon at the forge. It\'s crafted with:
- 2 Steel Ingots
- 2 Iron Ingots
- 2 Leather Straps
- 1 Refined Moonstone


---------------------------------------
Change Log
---------------------------------------

v1.0 (5/3/12) - Added weapon

---------------------------------------
Future Updates (Maybe)
---------------------------------------

- Custom sheath
- Better textures
- Better balance


---------------------------------------
Conflicts
---------------------------------------

None that I know of. If you find one, tell me. Pretty sure there won\'t be.


---------------------------------------
Terms of Use
---------------------------------------

You can use the mod, edit it, retexture it, whatever, but only for personal use. Please do not redistribute without my permission. Thank you.
author: Ky
